author: sidney
msg: Add sha1bin function for binary form of SHA1 using Digest::SHA1 if available or else slow pure perl. Update test cases for the changes

author: nicolaken
msg: Add skinconf.xml to the page aggregation, before the tabs, menu and body.
(@see [1] for a prior discussion that thought how this was a good idea)
Make every skin use the skinconf data in the aggregated xml instead of loading it from a file with the document() function.
